description:
Back in the past, when the platoon was still on their way to Earth, Keroro ordered take-out despite the fact that it`s forbidden.  Hijinks ensue!  And then all the members of the platoon are forbidden to use the toilet, with horrifying consequences...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kero Zero, Space Catering / Kero Zero, Formula for Eating
ケロ0 宇宙で出前 であります / ケロ0 食べたい方程式 であります
